text: John David Ashcroft (born May 9, 1942) is an American consultant, lobbyist and politician. He was the 79th United States Attorney General. He served during the first term of President George W. Bush from 2001 until 2005. Ashcroft was previously the Governor of Missouri (1985–1993) and a U.S. Senator from Missouri (1995–2001). Ashcroft was born in Chicago, Illinois. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American lobbyists Category:American Pentecostals Category:Governors of Missouri Category:People from Springfield, Missouri Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:United States Attorneys General Category:United States senators from Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Yale University alumni Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Missouri attorneys general
title: John Ashcroft
